page.title: 09 EVENTS - THE MEDIA
page.content:
The{'Bury Times'}is a local newspaper with a circulation of 26,000, costing 18p. It was first published in 1855 by {M.E. Heap}and cost 1d. A free paper, - {'The Midweeker'}is distributed each week, mainly subsidised by advertising. 23 journalists and 5 photographers are employed. {A survey of main events 7th June 1985 1. Many children will not receive reports because of teacher's action. 2. Free school milk given to some primary children will not be continued 3.{'The Classic'}cinema, the last in Bury is to close. 4. Preparations are in hand for Bury's 17th annual{Carnival. 5. There were photographs of Primary school children, drawing, painting, model making, and science.
B.G.S.Girls ( Prep ) & Holy Trinity
